Postgraduate Briefing Session 20242025-1
========================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Sep 30, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

Assalamualaikum and Good Day,

Welcome, all new postgraduate students!  
We cordially invite you to join the postgraduate briefing as follows.

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/NEW-STUDENTS-BRIEFING-POSTER-2425-1.png)

**Attendance is compulsory for new students.**

The briefing slides can be downloaded [HERE](https://drive.google.com/file/d/107SSHwoKeEVWmD9GumoTnCu80tDatwjn/view?usp=sharing)
.

Thank you.
